trans-unit.source: Provides an interface for a <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref> to display Windows Forms or to display a control in a drop-down area from a property grid control in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Gir et grensesnitt for en <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"> </xref> til å vise Windows Forms eller for å vise en kontroll i rullegardinlisten omgivelser rutenettkontrollen en egenskap i utformingsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The IWindowsFormsEditorService is only available through the <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: IWindowsFormsEditorService er bare tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> </xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A>

trans-unit.source: This service is typically used to display a form from the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>.
trans-unit.target: Denne tjenesten brukes vanligvis til å vise en form fra <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>-metoden til et <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> invokes the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> to provide a user interface for editing the value of a property, the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method is passed a reference to an <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that can typically provide an instance of the IWindowsFormsEditorService.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>aktiverer den <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>-metoden til et <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>oppgi et brukergrensesnitt for redigering av verdien for en egenskap av <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>metoden er sendt en referanse til en <xref:System.IServiceProvider>som vanligvis kan gi en forekomst av IWindowsFormsEditorService.</xref:System.IServiceProvider> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>

trans-unit.source: The methods of this service can be used to display dialog boxes and forms, or to show a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> within a drop down container that is shown on top of the property grid near the area of the value field whose value is being edited.
trans-unit.target: Metodene for denne tjenesten kan brukes til å vise dialogbokser og skjemaer, eller til å vise en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>i en rullegardinliste beholder som vises på egenskapen rutenettet nær området for verdifeltet der verdien blir redigert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: Closes any previously opened drop down control area.
trans-unit.target: Lukker alle tidligere åpnet rullegardin kontrollen området.

trans-unit.source: This method closes the drop down container area for a control that has been shown using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService.DropDownControl%2A> method, and releases the drop down container's reference to the control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden lukker rullegardin beholder området for en kontroll som har vist ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService.DropDownControl%2A>metoden, og frigir rullegardin beholderen referanse til kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService.DropDownControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Displays the specified control in a drop down area below a value field of the property grid that provides this service.
trans-unit.target: Viser den angitte kontrollen i en rullegardinliste området under et value-felt i egenskapen rutenettet som gir denne tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> can call this method to display a specified control in a drop down area over the property grid hosting the editor which uses this service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>-metoden til et <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>kan kalle denne metoden for å vise en angitt kontroll i en rullegardinliste området over rutenett for egenskap som er vert for redigeringsprogrammet for som bruker denne tjenesten.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When possible, the dimensions of the control will be maintained.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er mulig vedlikeholdes dimensjoner i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible due to the screen layout, the control may be resized.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dette ikke er mulig på grunn av skjermoppsettet kan kontrollen endres.

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the control resizes neatly, you should implement docking and anchoring, and possibly any resize event-handler update code.
trans-unit.target: For å sikre at kontrollen endrer størrelse direkte, bør du implementere forankringen og forankring og kanskje noen resize-hendelsesbehandlingen Oppdater koden.

trans-unit.source: If the user performs an action that causes the drop down to close, the control will be hidden and disposed by garbage collection if there is no other stored reference to the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis brukeren utfører en handling årsaker Slett ned Lukk, kontrollen skal skjules og fjernet av datasanering Hvis det er noen andre lagret referanse til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The drop down list <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to open.
This method displays the specified form.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden viser det angitte skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"></xref> indicating the result code returned by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"> </xref> som angir Resultatkode returnert av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref>.
